```{r}
filename <- file.choose()
crime <- readRDS(filename)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
crime1 <- filter(crime, OFFENSE=='02 ' | OFFENSE=='20 ' | OFFENSE =='17 ') 
write.csv(crime1, file="./data/crime.csv")
```

# Crime
```{r}
filename <- file.choose()
crime_2020 <- readRDS(filename)
```

```{r}
(crime_2020 = crime_2020[,c('agency_name', 'state_abb', 'year', 'month', 'population', 'actual_rape_total')])
write.csv(crime_2020, file="./data/crime/crime_2020.csv")
```
